description: Wondering how to glaze a ham for Christmas lunch or a family dinner? This classic mustard and honey glazed ham recipe will wow the whole family.
name: Honey Mustard Glazed Ham Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 kg Bertocchi Gold Half Ham on the Bone

recipeInstructions.text: Brush ham with a little butter mixture, then bake for 1 hour 15 minutes, basting every 15 minutes, or until golden and caramelised. Transfer ham to a platter, cover loosely with foil and rest for 30 minutes. Garnish with bay leaves and serve with wholegrain mustard and salad.
